posts.post_content:

Loughrey - F649, series 2, Mecca (major creases) - $5.00
Moran -  F30, no series, Mecca - $10
Jefferies (side) - F649, no series, Hassan - $7.50
Keyes - F649, no series, Hassan - $6.00 
Gardner - F649, no series, Mecca - $7.50 (trimmed)
Loughrey - F649, series 2, Mecca - $10
